title: スライスしたゆで卵
comment: 非常にシンプルながら卵の質がはっきり出る一品です。包丁の切り方で見た目と食感が変わるので、ちょっとした職人気分が味わえます。黄身の輝きに思わず笑顔になる、卵好きにはたまらない一皿です。
image_prompt: A close-up, highly detailed, appetizing photograph of a sliced hard-boiled egg arranged fan-like on a small rustic ceramic plate. The egg whites are smooth and glossy, the yolks are rich, creamy golden with a slightly soft center visible where sliced, showing delicate texture and inviting creaminess. Lightly sprinkled with flaky sea salt and freshly cracked black pepper, topped with finely chopped chives and a tiny drizzle of extra virgin olive oil for sheen. Shot in warm natural window light with a shallow depth of field, soft bokeh background of a wooden table and linen napkin, 45-degree angle composition, macro lens-level detail, vibrant natural colors, realistic food photography style, mouth-watering, minimal props, crisp focus on the egg slices and pleasing soft shadows for an elegant, homey presentation.
